text: Official Discussion - Triangle of Sadness [SPOILERS]
Post sale sadness - have you ever seen your loved garden ripped out?
William Shatner: My Trip to Space Filled Me With ‘Overwhelming Sadness’
[Equipe de France] Injured in training, Christopher Nkunku must give up participating in the World Cup. The whole group shares Christopher's sadness and wishes him a speedy recovery
Charlbi Dean Dies Of Sudden Illness: Star Of Palme d’Or Winner ‘Triangle Of Sadness’ Was 32

Why do people look at you with so much sadness when you say you don’t want kids? So I’m a nurse, the topic of “do you have kids?” Or “are you going to have kids?” seems to come up constantly with my patients. And every time I say the same thing: “no I don’t, I don’t plan on it. It’s not in the cards for me” they always have the saddest look on their face like I’m pathetic. And one of the common arguments is: “who will take care of you when you’re older?” - which I think is awful because why would I bring an unwanted child into this world for the sole purpose of guilt tripping them into caring for me when I’m older?! Pisses me off that people think it’s tragic I don’t want children. Thanks for listening to my rant.

It is with great sadness that today I must close my business My business , a  honey bottling and distribution  centre, which has been in my family for 5 generations, just can't sustain the high cost of living. 
I employ 18 wonderful people, and im sitting in my office thinking how on earth am i going to go down to the factory floor and tell them that by the end of today they won't have jobs ? 
We were doing OK until my accountant  flagged that for the last 6 months someone in the company has been buying branded honey daily at €4 a pop for their porridge in the morning. 
I'm not sure who it was because half my staff have been out sick with them all reporting cases of mild to severe diabetes.
Poor June in payroll had to get two fingers amputated and can't work a calculator  now..resulting in some staff members being incorrectly paid and going on strike. 
Stay safe out there..
Michael - Chief Bee 🐝

[WP] A vampire woman stands in front of you. "any last words before I feed on you, human?" she says. Instead of fear a filling of pity wells up inside you. "Do you miss the sunrise?" you reply. Fully expecting to die there you're surprised when she replies "yes" with a look of sadness on her face.
I drew a picture of hidden sadness. I'm calling it "Superposition" It took me a while to get the expression I wanted to show.

I just finished GoW Ragnarok and I’m really sad now, not because of the ending but because it’s over, so many years waiting for this story and in a little over a week it’s over… how do you guys deal with the sadness that comes with finishing an amazing game like this? I always get depressed when an amazing game ends, how do you guys deal with those kinds of emotions, if you have them at all?
Triangle of Sadness: The 'eat the rich' comedy goes gross-out, and it's great
Sadness
Going to assume Triangle of Sadness should NOT have looked like this

after almost 3 months since our sweet girl passed, we adopted again. this is Bats, Batty, Batso. I am so excited to love him and train him and have a great life with him but I also have tons of guilt and sadness, too.
10 weeks old, but already looking like she has faced a lifetime of sadness. I wasn't ready for these puppy sad eyes. She gets so many extra treats a day with these eyes.
Sadness
SADNESS 100
Blursed_sadness
Diet rootbeer jello, 20cal for the whole tray. Tastes like the floor of a Pizza Street and sadness.
It is with great sadness that i announce that my favourite chonker cat has sadly passed on
This was the first time I have seen genuine sadness in his face. She isn't the person he wanted but he had respect for her.
Musk is unleashing the hateful racist crazies on Twitter, and now he's crying sad billionaire tears that Apple may remove Twitter from their app store.
